front.title: OSCOAP profile of the Authentication and Authorization for Constrained Environments Framework

abstract.t: This memo specifies a profile for the Authentication and Authorization for Constrained Environments (ACE) framework. It utilizes Object Security of CoAP (OSCOAP) to provide communication security, server authentication, and proof-of-possession for a key owned by the client and bound to an OAuth 2.0 access token.
